articles.description: India cricketer Hanuma Vihari questioned the absence of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma in the decider against West Indies. Vihari said that the stalwarts could have rested at home if they were not needed in the ODIs.
articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: India decided to rest Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli once again from their playing XI, this time in the series decider against West Indies. Hardik Pandya captained the India… [+2206 chars]

articles.author: Vidit Dhawan
articles.title: F1 Expert Breakdowns Why Max Verstappen Insanely Got More Than 20 Secs Lead Over Sergio Perez in Same Car - The SportsRush - The Sportsrush
articles.description: An F1 expert has explained how Max Verstappen was able to generate a 20+ second advantage over Sergio Perez at the Belgian Grand Prix.
articles.content: Max Verstappen continued his domination at the Belgian GP this past weekend as he won the race by finishing more than 20 seconds ahead of his teammate Sergio Perez. What was surprising about Verstapp… [+3539 chars]
